title: Draft pick on oce
body: I really think there should be draft pick on oce like ever region i dont see why not because, a lot of lvl 30+ players will play it and its a better way to secure roles like every other region does. why dont we have it yet

replies.body:
1. Why necro?
2. At the time thsi thread was made riot were still saying no to draft pick.
I know... I'm saying like, little did you know we would have Draft Pick in the future haha :)

1. Not every other region has it. only 3 do. NA, EUW and BR.

2. Riot are planning to remove Draft Normals from every region.

3. Riot planned to add the role selector to normals but i havent heard anything about this in a while

https://www.riftherald.com/lol-patch-notes/2016/11/9/13574822/lol-normal-draft-queue-removed-why

cmon did you see the skin they gave us 
riot doesn't care about oce
